name: Phoenix Copper Ltd.
description: Phoenix Copper Ltd. is a mining and exploration company based in the United Kingdom, focused on the development of its flagship asset, the Empire Mine project located in Idaho, USA. Founded in 2017, the company aims to capitalize on the growing demand for copper, gold, and silver, as the world transitions towards more sustainable energy solutions and electric vehicles, which rely heavily on these metals. The Empire Mine project hosts significant reserves of copper and gold, and Phoenix Copper is committed to sustainable mining practices and environmental stewardship throughout its operations. The company's strategy includes advancing the Empire Mine project through exploration and development phases while also seeking opportunities to acquire additional mining assets. By leveraging advanced technologies and innovative mining techniques, Phoenix Copper strives to maximize resource recovery while minimizing environmental impact. The company is well-positioned to benefit from the increasing global demand for critical minerals and aims to contribute to the local economy through job creation and responsible mining practices.
